DON'T QUAKE LIKE A SNAKE UNLESS YOU ARE TOO SMOOTH IN THE GROOVE.

Mark is a Triskele.

Mark is a Tattoo.

Foreheads from Arthur's seat.

Foreheads of jailhouse ink.

Four heads are better than one.

Four Eyes are not what you think.

Two hands are in the mirror.

That's the only one you say.

If you are right,there's noone left.

To fight for your love today.

HOW MANY MIRRORS.

HOW MANY TIMES.

STYLE IS A GENRE.

THE SHAPE IS A CIRCLE.

So don't be square.

Because noone cares.

Who is noone ?!

trackinfo.lyrics: and so it comes to pass / those of an age and of no class / are mere fodder for the engines of today / very much out in the cold / with very little worth to hold / i never wanted this fucking system anyway / so as i see the bailiffs come / my works of a homelife are all undone / hai so yay fuck this baby it's time to have my way  i'll be a new breed of an outlaw / as  you know i tried to set you free / and then even did i try a little to fit in /but the system didn't shift / no and the system didn't care / so i reckon it'sd time i had a fucking say / so stand and deliver/ your money or your life / my fun now is to fall upon your fear / stand and deliver / your money or your life / i'll take your cash for my fine living / i may let you keep all else you may find dear /  i'm the new breed of an outlaw / a technological result of yesterday / i know i had my worth / but i was shot down to the curb / while you pretended to proceed into the fray / so now the only fray / you will defer to shall be like as on the wearing down of the rope that binds you to your valuables today / stand and deliver / your money or your life / i'm the new breed of an outlaw / the dispossessed you thought long gone / and now your politics have driven me awry / stand and deliver to this new breed of gun /as i motion on your willing wife to lay.

            2016...

40 years of punk rock

100 years since World War One's 'No Man's Land' ...



The sun now it shines on the green fields of France

There's a warm summer breeze, it makes the red poppies dance.

And look how the sun shines from under the clouds

There's no gas, no barbed wire, no guns firing now.

But here in this graveyard it's still no-man's-land.

The countless white crosses stand mute in the sand,

To man's blind indifference to his fellow man,

To a whole generation that were butchered and damned.

(Eric Bogle)

trackinfo.title: I
trackinfo.lyrics:
These aged walls are growing cold,but feel the warmth with.
An act of god,an adage too old,to be considered without sin.
The writing on the wall is plain,for those who still can laugh.
A thought maybe,I think I must,explain a different path.

So here's a song for the wicked,in wit not in deed.
The unlikely story of the ancient in creed.
A song for the lover & a hymn for the will.
If loving is willing,under all there's no ill.

Stephen Surreal, circa fuck knows.

< SKUM >.title: Soundtracks For The Aftermath Of Violence
< SKUM >.about:
The digital & Downloadable version available from The Elderbranch Campaign's site on bandcamp.

Soundtracks For The Aftermath Of Violence, the 10th album by The Elderbranch Campaign, is a collection of interpretive soundscapes chronicling the days and weeks following the events presented in their 9th album, Audio Chronicles Of The Drumhead. An inward view of the gradual decay we all experience when confronted with the civilized incivility of institutionalized state sanctioned violence. Stylistically and musically it is a logical progression from Audio Chronicles Of The Drumhead, with synths, found objects, walls of distortion and highly processed field recordings creating complex and vivid audio sculptures that act as soundtracks for the mind.



ABSOLUTELY BEST EXPERIENCED OVER HEADPHONES.

credits

released 01 April 2015



The Elderbranch Campaign are: G M Slater and Stephen Robert Rook Thompson.

Composed, performed and produced by The Elderbranch Campaign.

Recorded in 2014 - 2015 at their home studios in Nottingham UK and Santa Barbara USA.

Artwork by G M Slater

< SKUM >.title: ~UNUNE~ Bi Polar Variables
< SKUM >.about: Amongst other mental & physical problems,the artist mainly 'responsible' for the work of ~UNUNE~,was diagnosed with manic depression in early life.

< SKUM >.title: BEST & WORST OF (ENTIRETY)
< SKUM >.about:
We came,we wrecked things,we whipped people,we made Tabitha Zu cry,we refused to stop playing,we kicked the fuck out of each other....

Banned after every 'Assault' at every venue...

'Digitally enhanced' as far as possible - the idea was never really to record,more to lay down ideas,then play them live whilst provoking audiences....
< SKUM >.credits:
released February 3, 2014
            
            William Wound / Vocals. Dave Rave / Guitar. Steve Surreal/ Bass,Keyboards,Percussion,Backing Tapes.

< SKUM >.title: Nowhere Fast 1 Punk 4 The Homeless (Bonus Tracks)
< SKUM >.about:
Punk 4 The Homeless have been helping street children for four years now by supporting the work of Casa Alianza. Obviously( although you wouldn’t know it if it was just left to the national press) children, for the crime of being poor, are still being exterminated in their masses. However we have and still continue to make a small difference to some lives. Thats where you come in. We have a massive 4 volume compilation album coming out called “Doin it 4 the kids” on December 14th and are trying to recruit as many promoters to put a gig on around that time for us as possible, thereby not only plugging the albums but also waking people, the press etc. up to the atrocities inflicted on the most vulnerable people in our world, thank you for your time, Eagle Spits P.S. I have enclosed a couple of links 



www.casa-alianza.org.uk



  www.youtube.com/watch?v=X3-gddJDFtc
< SKUM >.credits:
released October 2, 2013
            
            This album is for 'Punk 4 The Homeless' 

All proceeds will be transferred to  www.casa-alianza.org.uk  - Please fork out what you can.(Album originally on stoneage records-jahkarta)

Steve Surreal for Agony For Pleasure.

< SKUM >.title: ~UNUNE~  Analogue Fixation For Anal Retention
< SKUM >.about:
The comments herein are not those of the 'Agony For Pleasure' label,they are merely the viewpoint of the creator..........................

1:Cover art - It may appear to most,as this artiste couldn't be bothered including the album title...NOT SO...The concept within the 'No words' theory is thus:Humanity & it's technological advances,will never truly create 'True Black' or 'True White', in a similar way to it being impossible to travel at light speed (at least I hope not,as I don't want to spend eternity falling into a black hole)..............

SO : The appearance of this cover,is in itself indicative of the 'digital worlds' attempt at altering an analogue reality. (see end notes).

2: Tracks - All tracks were originally of 'an analogue nature' in recording,the title itself (as it appears in the release) could 'in a way' be a 'slight' hint of a theoretical adage,in line with Aleister Crowley's magnificent design, within the titles of 'The Book Of Truth' & 'The Book Of Lies'..................................

3: Track naming - Although obvious with 'To Stand Alone' featuring Countess M,The fact that many still assume this artiste merely 'picks random titles' in an attempt to attract attention,is not the case-this assumption has been 'floating around' since 1979 (albeit within a hideously long length of alter ego's).For those capable of 'thinking outside the box' ( If Schrodinger had given the world his theory in the 'nanny states' we now reside in-he would have been persecuted for Animal Cruelty )...blah,blah,blah...It should seem fairly easy to deduce why each track has been named as such.................................

4: 'See Below' - All enquiry regarding the nature of how this artiste's mind works,should be sent to :  fuckyou@fuckoff.com  ......................

5:'Why the fuck is my computer trying to inform me that I dont know how to spell 'enquiry' - I neither know nor care.
